TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed Environment/SpecialFolder extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies enumerated constants used to retrieve directory paths to system special folders.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The system special folders are folders such as **Program Files**, **Programs**, **System**, or **Startup**, which contain common information. Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows.
The <xref:System.Environment.GetFolderPath%2A> method returns the locations associated with this enumeration. The locations of these folders can have different values on different operating systems, the user can change some of the locations, and the locations are localized.
For more information about special folders, see the [KNOWNFOLDERID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd378457.aspx) constants in the Windows documentation.
## Examples The following example shows how to use Environment.SpecialFolder with the <xref:System.Environment.GetFolderPath%2A> method to get the System directory.
[!code-cpp[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.environment.spe_1.cpp)] [!code-vb[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.environment.spe_1.vb)] [!code-cs[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.environment.spe_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder AdminTools = int32(48)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that is used to store administrative tools for an individual user. The Microsoft Management Console (MMC) will save customized consoles to this directory, and it will roam with the user. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder ApplicationData = int32(26)

Docs.summary: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data for the current roaming user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A roaming user works on more than one computer on a network. A roaming user's profile is kept on a server on the network and is loaded onto a system when the user logs on.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CDBurning = int32(59)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that acts as a staging area for files waiting to be written to a CD. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonAdminTools = int32(47)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that contains administrative tools for all users of the computer. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonApplicationData = int32(35)

Docs.summary: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data that is used by all users.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonDesktopDirectory = int32(25)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that contains files and folders that appear on the desktop for all users. This special folder is valid only for Windows NT systems. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonDocuments = int32(46)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that contains documents that are common to all users. This special folder is valid for Windows NT systems, Windows 95, and Windows 98 systems with Shfolder.dll installed. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonMusic = int32(53)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that serves as a repository for music files common to all users. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonOemLinks = int32(58)

Docs.summary: This value is recognized in Windows Vista for backward compatibility, but the special folder itself is no longer used. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonPictures = int32(54)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that serves as a repository for image files common to all users. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonProgramFiles = int32(43)

Docs.summary:
The directory for components that are shared across applications.
To get the x86 common program files directory on a non-x86 system, use the ProgramFilesX86 member.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonProgramFilesX86 = int32(44)

Docs.summary: The **Program Files** folder. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonPrograms = int32(23)

Docs.summary: A folder for components that are shared across applications. This special folder is valid only for Windows NT, Windows 2000, and Windows XP systems. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonStartMenu = int32(22)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that contains the programs and folders that appear on the **Start** menu for all users. This special folder is valid only for Windows NT systems. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonStartup = int32(24)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that contains the programs that appear in the **Startup** folder for all users. This special folder is valid only for Windows NT systems. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonTemplates = int32(45)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that contains the templates that are available to all users. This special folder is valid only for Windows NT systems. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonVideos = int32(55)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that serves as a repository for video files common to all users. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder Cookies = int32(33)

Docs.summary: The directory that serves as a common repository for Internet cookies.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder Desktop = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The logical Desktop rather than the physical file system location.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder DesktopDirectory = int32(16)

Docs.summary: The directory used to physically store file objects on the desktop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Do not confuse this directory with the desktop folder itself, which is a virtual folder.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder Favorites = int32(6)

Docs.summary: The directory that serves as a common repository for the user's favorite items.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder Fonts = int32(20)

Docs.summary: A virtual folder that contains fonts. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder History = int32(34)

Docs.summary: The directory that serves as a common repository for Internet history items.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder InternetCache = int32(32)

Docs.summary: The directory that serves as a common repository for temporary Internet files.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder LocalApplicationData = int32(28)

Docs.summary: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data that is used by the current, non-roaming user.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder LocalizedResources = int32(57)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that contains localized resource data. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder MyComputer = int32(17)

Docs.summary: The **My Computer** folder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The MyComputer constant always yields the empty string ("") because no path is defined for the My Computer folder.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder MyDocuments = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The **My Documents** folder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is equivalent to Personal.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder MyMusic = int32(13)

Docs.summary: The **My Music** folder.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder MyPictures = int32(39)

Docs.summary: The **My Pictures** folder.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder MyVideos = int32(14)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that serves as a repository for videos that belong to a user. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder NetworkShortcuts = int32(19)

Docs.summary: A file system directory that contains the link objects that may exist in the **My Network Places** virtual folder. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder Personal = int32(5)

Docs.summary: The directory that serves as a common repository for documents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is equivalent to MyDocuments.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder PrinterShortcuts = int32(27)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that contains the link objects that can exist in the **Printers** virtual folder. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder ProgramFiles = int32(38)

Docs.summary:
The program files directory.
On a non-x86 system, passing ProgramFiles to the method returns the path for non-x86 programs. To get the x86 program files directory on a non-x86 system, use the ProgramFilesX86 member.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder ProgramFilesX86 = int32(42)

Docs.summary: The x86 **Program Files** folder. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder Programs = int32(2)

Docs.summary: The directory that contains the user's program groups.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder Recent = int32(8)

Docs.summary: The directory that contains the user's most recently used documents.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder Resources = int32(56)

Docs.summary: The file system directory that contains resource data. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder SendTo = int32(9)

Docs.summary: The directory that contains the Send To menu items.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder StartMenu = int32(11)

Docs.summary: The directory that contains the Start menu items.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder Startup = int32(7)

Docs.summary: The directory that corresponds to the user's Startup program group.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The system starts these programs whenever a user logs on or starts Windows NT or later, or starts Windows 98.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder System = int32(37)

Docs.summary: The System directory.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder SystemX86 = int32(41)

Docs.summary: The Windows **System** folder. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder Templates = int32(21)

Docs.summary: The directory that serves as a common repository for document templates.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder UserProfile = int32(40)

Docs.summary: The user's profile folder. Applications should not create files or folders at this level; they should put their data under the locations referred to by ApplicationData. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder Windows = int32(36)

Docs.summary: The Windows directory or SYSROOT. This corresponds to the %windir% or %SYSTEMROOT% environment variables. Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/add/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].
